siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: LecturePro is a notes-assistant that helps students pay attention in class. It listens to the lecture with you, and also takes notes for you. You can download these notes and edit as well!
blogPost.body: LecturePro is a notes-assistant that helps students pay attention in class. It listens to the lecture with you, and also takes notes for you. You can download these notes and edit as well!
blogPost.title: Lecture Pro - Notes-assistant for students across the globe!
blogPost.author: meraj@code.in

localize.description: LecturePro是一款帮助学生在课堂上专心听讲的笔记助手。它和你一起听课，还能为你做笔记。你可以下载这些笔记，也可以进行编辑!
LecturePro是一款幫助學生在課堂上專心聽講的筆記助手。它和你一起聽課，還能爲你做筆記。你可以下載這些筆記，也可以進行編輯!

previous.excerpt: Unlike most calendars, Daybridge doesn’t confine you to a half-empty grid. So you’re free to structure your day exactly how you like. Mix events, tasks, and notes together in the same place.
previous.title: Daybridge - A calendar built for people, not companies.

localize.description: 与大多数日历不同的是，Daybridge 不会将你限制在一个半空的格子里。因此，你可以自由地按照自己的喜好来安排一天的工作。你可以将事件、任务和笔记混合在同一个地方。
localize.tagline: 一个为人而不是为公司打造的日历。

localize.description: 與大多數日曆不同的是，Daybridge 不會將你限制在一個半空的格子裏。因此，你可以自由地按照自己的喜好來安排一天的工作。你可以將事件、任務和筆記混合在同一個地方。
localize.tagline: 一個爲人而不是爲公司打造的日曆。

next.excerpt: Create awesome effects like skeuomorph, neon, glitch, glass, and more - right in Figma! One-click transforms, adjust properties with ease, mix & match. Go creative! Available for free in the Figma community.
next.title: Morph Plugin for Figma - Create awesome effects right in Figma

localize.description: 在Figma中创建超棒的效果，如Skeuomorph、霓虹灯、闪光、玻璃等--就在Figma中！一键变换，轻松调整属性，混合匹配。一键转换，轻松调整属性，混合和匹配。发挥创意吧 可在 Figma 社区免费使用。
localize.tagline: 在Figma中直接创建超棒的效果

localize.description: 在Figma中創建超棒的效果，如Skeuomorph、霓虹燈、閃光、玻璃等--就在Figma中！一鍵變換，輕鬆調整屬性，混合匹配。一鍵轉換，輕鬆調整屬性，混合和匹配。發揮創意吧 可在 Figma 社區免費使用。
localize.tagline: 在Figma中直接創建超棒的效果
